text: ‘‘allahanu hage bayasiddare navagali nam'ma purvajaragali bahudevaradhane maduttiralilla mattu navu yavudannu nisid'dhavendu pariganisuttiralilla’’- endu bahudevaradhakaru khandita heluvaru. Avariginta hindinavaru nam'ma sikseya ruci kanuva tanaka ide ritiya sullannu heliddaru. Heliri; nim'ma bali khacita jnanavenadaru iddare adannu nam'ma munde prakatisiri. Nivantu kevala uheya hinde nadeyuttiruviri mattu kevala bhramisuttiruviri
